userKey.description: Database key of the user that has produced the results

participantKey.description: Database key of the participant profile that has produced the results

studyKey.description: Database key of the study this task belongs to

taskId.description: Id of the task, as specified in the study description

createdTS.description: Timestamp of when the task was created, either on the app or on the database, as ISO date string

discarded.description: Indicates if the task results were discarded, in which case no summary and no data is associated with this report

phone.description: Data related to the phone used for this task

summary.description: Summary object of the results, stored on the database

startedTS.description: Timestamp of when the task was started, as ISO date string

completedTS.description: Timestamp of when the task was completed, as ISO date string
